hero.title: Welcome to Gramin | Authentic Vegetarian Delights
hero.subtitle: Savor the pure taste of tradition and fresh, wholesome ingredients, crafted with love for a truly delightful dining experience.

about.title: Experience the Heart of Pure Vegetarian Cuisine at Gramin
about.paragraph1: At Gramin, we believe in the power of pure, wholesome vegetarian food to nourish both body and soul. Our culinary journey is a heartfelt celebration of fresh, seasonal ingredients meticulously crafted into delightful dishes that honor tradition while exciting your palate.
about.paragraph2: From comforting classics to innovative culinary creations, every dish at Gramin is prepared with passion and served with a smile. We invite you to step into our warm and inviting space, leave the everyday behind, and discover a world of vibrant flavors that only authentic vegetarian cuisine can offer.
